name: Tomb of Scares
description:
Welcome to Scaresville's annual Scarestival! What you expected to be a peaceful day of trick-or-treating takes a turn for the worse... Will you be able to save your friend?

Features!!!
- 31+4 friends!
- 6(66) spooky zones!
- A funky new soundtrack by Patrik Pettersson!
- 5 frightening endings!
- 6 outfits with different abilities!
- Oogly boogly BOO! 👺

tomboffriends.tumblr.com - @tomboffriends

Download the soundtrack for free from Bandcamp!
https://prutte.bandcamp.com/album/tomb-of-scares-official-soundtrack
